price: 29 « Allez donc vers le châtiment que vous traitiez de mensonge !
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
